description: Primes whose sum of digits is a multiple of 7.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,1000
example: 419 is a prime with sum of digits = 14, hence belongs to the sequence.
prog: (PARI) SumD(x)= { s=0; while (x>9, s+=x-10*(x\10); x\=10); return(s + x) } { n=0; forprime (p=2, 10^5, if (SumD(p)%7 == 0, write("b062336.txt", n++, " ", p); if (n==1000, break)) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 05 2009](MAGMA) [ p: p in PrimesUpTo(100000) | &+Intseq(p) mod 7 eq 0 ]; // Vincenzo Librandi, Apr 02 2011
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Jun 21 2001
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Jul 06 2001
